telegramparser 0.0.0.9008
  • Reference

Package index

All functions

tp_get_info()
Retrieve from the web basic information about the Telegram channel
tp_get_metadata()
Get (and cache) metadata for previously exported Telegram files
tp_get_options()
Retrieve package options as set for the current session
tp_get_username()
Checks if a channel username has been stored locally
tp_import()
Imports all contents of exported channels
tp_read_archive()
Read archives created with tg-archive
tp_read_json()
Reads a full Telegram file exported as json, and reads it in as a tibble
tp_read_messages()
Transform a full import of Telegram into a tibble with textual contents as plain character strings
tp_rename()
Rename Telegram export files consistently
tp_select()
Select a Telegram channel from a folder where multiple archives are stored
tp_set_all_usernames()
Interactively set all Telegram channel usernames not yet stored locally
tp_set_options()
Set options for telegramparser
tp_set_username()
Set the channel username for locally stored Telegram channels

Developed by Giorgio Comai.
